report.title: Samples List for npms_sample_occurrences form 5
report.description: Used by the Samples grid to retrieve the samples associated with a survey and user. User can be identified by their Indicia User ID. A second sample may be linked to a first sample, the id of which is stored in a custom attribute. The id of that custom attribute is passed as a parameter to the report. New version of the report only returns data for squares you are assigned to.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM users u JOIN person_attribute_values pav ON pav.person_id = u.person_id AND pav.person_attribute_id = #person_square_attr_id# AND pav.updated_by_id <> u.id AND pav.deleted = false JOIN locations plot ON plot.parent_id=pav.int_value AND plot.deleted=false JOIN locations square ON square.id=plot.parent_id AND (square.id=#square_id# OR #square_id#=0) AND square.deleted=false JOIN cache_samples_functional csf ON csf.location_id = plot.id AND csf.survey_id = #survey_id# JOIN cache_samples_nonfunctional csnf ON csnf.id = csf.id LEFT JOIN location_attribute_values lavPlotName ON lavPlotName.location_attribute_id=#plot_number_attr_id# AND lavPlotName.location_id=plot.id AND lavPlotName.deleted=false JOIN cache_termlists_terms termPlotType ON termPlotType.id = plot.location_type_id WHERE u.id=#iUserID# AND (csf.location_id=#plot_id# OR #plot_id#=0) AND ((trim('#year#') = '' OR '#year#'='Click here' OR csf.date_end >= CAST(COALESCE('#year#' || '-01-01','1500-01-01') as date)) AND (trim('#year#') = '' OR '#year#'='Click here' OR csf.date_start <= CAST(COALESCE('#year#' || '-12-31','1500-01-01') as date))) AND u.deleted=false #order_by#

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Select the survey to return data for?
param.query: SELECT id, title as caption FROM surveys

param.name: iUserID
param.description: Indicia User ID: use 0 to ignore

param.name: s1AttrID
param.description: The ID of the sample attribute that links a second sample to a first

param.name: plot_number_attr_id
param.description: Id of the location attribute that holds the plot number label

param.name: person_square_attr_id
param.description: Id of the person attribute that holds user squares

param.name: plot_id
param.description: ID of plot to limit results to

param.name: square_id
param.description: Select a square, or leave blank for all squares

param.name: year
param.description: Select a year, or leave blank for all years

column.name: sample_1_id
column.sql: coalesce(case when (csnf.attrs_json->>'227')::integer != 0 then (csnf.attrs_json->>'227')::integer ELSE NULL END,csf.id)

column.name: location_name
column.sql: COALESCE( case when lavPlotName.text_value IS null then '' || 'Plot at ' || plot.centroid_sref || ' ('|| termPlotType.term || ') ' || '' else '' || 'Plot ' || lavPlotName.text_value || ' at ' || plot.centroid_sref || ' ('|| termPlotType.term || ') ' || '' end , csf.location_name, csnf.public_entered_sref)

column.name: survey_number
column.sql: case when ((csnf.attrs_json->>'227')::integer IS NOT NULL AND (csnf.attrs_json->>'227')::integer != 0) THEN 'Survey 2' when ((csnf.attrs_json->>'227')::integer IS NULL OR (csnf.attrs_json->>'227')::integer = 0) THEN 'Survey 1' ELSE '' END
